successes.title: The Electron: Cellular dev kit with a global data plan
successes.description: The Electron is an Arduino-like cellular development kit with a SIM card and affordable data plan from the creators of the Spark Core.

Pledges.description: T-SHIRT: Show your support for the Electron and Spark community with this uber-soft tee with our logo. U.S. shipment only.
2G EARLY BIRD SPECIAL:  Includes 1 Electron 2G and 1 SIM card. (VAT included for international orders)
ELECTRON 2G: Includes 1 Electron 2G and 1 SIM card. (VAT included for international orders)
3G EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Includes 1 Electron 3G and 1 SIM card. (VAT included for international orders)
ELECTRON 3G: Includes 1 Electron 3G and 1 SIM card. (VAT included for international orders)

2G ASSET TRACKER: Includes our full 2G Asset Tracker Kit — an Electron 2G and a SIM card, plus a GPS+battery shield. Use this to monitor the location of anything. (VAT included for international orders)
A COUPLE OF ELECTRONS: 2 Electron 3Gs (plus SIM cards) OR 3 Electron 2Gs (plus SIM cards). (VAT included for international orders)

3G ASSET TRACKER: Includes our full 3G Asset Tracker Kit — an Electron 3G and a SIM card, plus a GPS+battery shield. Use this to monitor the location of anything. (VAT included for international orders)

2G ULTIMATE SENSOR KIT: The Sensor Kit will fulfill your dreams! Crush your enemies! Revive the dead! But really, it's a collection of our favorite sensors for remote applications like temperature, motion, distance, sound, and air quality. Includes 1 Electron 2G and 1 SIM card. (VAT included for international orders)

3G ULTIMATE SENSOR KIT: The Sensor Kit will fulfill your dreams! Crush your enemies! Revive the dead! But really, it's a collection of our favorite sensors for remote applications like temperature, motion, distance, sound, and air quality. Includes 1 Electron 3G and 1 SIM card. (VAT included for international orders)
2G COMPLETE SOLAR KIT: Power from the heavens! This kit includes an Electron 2G, a SIM card, a battery, a charging and prototyping shield, and a 6W solar panel.
3G COMPLETE SOLAR KIT: Power from the heavens! This kit includes an Electron 3G, a SIM card, a battery, a charging and prototyping shield, and a 6W solar panel.
A HANDFUL OF ELECTRONS: 5 Electron 3Gs (plus SIM cards) OR 7 Electron 2Gs (plus SIM cards). (VAT included for international orders)
A LOT OF ELECTRONS: 10 Electron 3Gs (plus SIM cards) OR 15 Electron 2Gs (plus SIM cards). (VAT included for international orders)

BETA TESTER: Be one of the first to get your hands on a Electron as part of our beta-testing team. Your input will have direct impact on the board (engineering experience recommended). Includes A HANDFUL OF ELECTRONS (5 Electron 3Gs or 7 Electron 2Gs, plus SIMs). U.S. only.

WORKSHOP: Jump-start your development with a full-day workshop/hackathon with the Spark team in San Francisco. We'll help you build a prototype of your cellular-connected product. Includes A LOT OF ELECTRONS (10 Electron 3Gs or 15 Electron 2Gs, plus SIMs). Travel costs not included.
